entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 60%
